el_class=”WorBtnTabsSelected”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

X

November 17 (Thursday)
08:30 AM

11:45 PM

 Liver Transplant Radiology HALL C
Moderators  Mohamed Fawzi, MD (National Liver Institute, Egypt)

 Mohamed Sobhi, MD (Ain shams university, Egypt)
Target audience Trainees in radiologists who are directly or indirectly in liver transplant.
Liver transplant surgeon, liver transplant hepatologist, or medical coordinators.
Experienced interventional radiologists the opportunity to fine-tune their practical skills.
Objectives Increase imaging interpretation effectiveness in the field of liver imaging and donor evaluation.
To introduce the fundamental concepts of Interventional Radiology.
Give overview of the currently available techniques in the field of percutaneous tumor ablation.
Learn about the latest evidence and techniques for performing radioembolisation.
High lights the recent advances in management of post-transplantation complications.
Additional Instructions Please contact the organizer for registration.
08:30 AM

09:30 AM

 Radiology Workshop Part 1: (Diagnostic)
08:30 AM

08:45 AM

 Preoperative evaluation of donor

Mohamed Fawzi (National Liver Institute, Egypt)
08:45 AM

09:00 AM

 Preoperative evaluation of recipient

Allam Elsayed (Ain shams university, Egypt)
09:00 AM

09:15 AM

 Post-operative follow up of donor and recipient

Mohamed Hemiely (Ain shams university, Egypt)
09:15 AM

09:30 AM

 Discussion
09:30 AM

10:30 AM

 Radiology Workshop Part 2: (Interventional)
09:30 AM

09:45 AM

 Bridging and down staging, concept

Haitham Nasser (Ain shams university, Egypt)
09:45 AM

10:00 AM

 Radiofrequency in the context of transplantation

Mohamed Hamed (Cairo university, Egypt)
10:00 AM

10:15 AM

 Microwave in the context of transplantation

Usama Shiha (Mansoura University, Egypt)
10:15 AM

10:30 AM

 Discussion
10:15 AM

10:30 AM

 Break
10:30 AM

11:45 AM

 Radiology Workshop Part 3: (Interventional)
10:45 AM

11:00 AM

 TACE for bridging and down staging

Sameh Abdelwahab (Ain shams university, Egypt)
11:00 AM

11:15 AM

 TARE for bridging and down staging

Mohamed Sobhi (Ain shams university, Egypt)
11:15 AM

11:30 AM

 Management of vascular complications of transplantation

Mohamed Gharib (Ain shams university, Egypt)
11:30 AM

11:45 PM

 Discussion
